Notes: The sample is composed of PSID respondents ages 30-66 in 2017. Each cell represents the results from a separate unweighted OLS regression. Standard errors are reported in parentheses and are corrected for clustering based on the state of residence in which the respondent lived as a teenager. Sample sizes are reported in brackets. All regressions include fixed effects for state of residence in 2017 and fixed effects for the state in which the respondent lived as a teenager. Controls include 5-year age bin indicators, gender, race, ethnicity, educational attainment, the unemployment rate in the state where the respondent lived as a teenager, an indicator for whether the state where the respondent lived as a teenager had passed a comprehensive smoke-free law, and indicators for the MLPA in the state where the respondent lived as a teenager.
